description: Digital payment transaction records for UPI (Unified Payments Interface) in India for 2024

columns.name: transaction_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each transaction in format TXN followed by 10 digits

columns.name: timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the transaction occurred in format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

columns.name: transaction_type
columns.description: Type of transaction indicating the nature of payment
valid_values: Bill Payment - Utility or service bill payment

columns.name: merchant_category
columns.description: Category of merchant or expense type. NULL for P2P transactions since no merchant is involved
columns.null_condition: Always NULL when transaction_type is P2P

columns.name: sender_age_group
columns.description: Age range of the person initiating the transaction

columns.name: receiver_age_group
columns.description: Age range of the person receiving the payment. NULL for non-P2P transactions
columns.null_condition: NULL when transaction_type is not P2P (i.e., for P2M, Bill Payment, Recharge)

columns.name: sender_state
columns.description: Indian state where the sender is located

columns.name: device_type
columns.description: Type of device used to initiate the transaction

columns.name: network_type
columns.description: Type of internet connection used during transaction

columns.name: fraud_flag
columns.description: Binary flag indicating if transaction was flagged for review. 0 means not flagged, 1 means flagged. IMPORTANT: This indicates flagged for review, NOT confirmed fraud
valid_values: 1 - Flagged for review (does not mean confirmed fraud)

columns.name: hour_of_day
columns.description: Hour of the day when transaction occurred (24-hour format, 0-23)

columns.name: day_of_week
columns.description: Day of the week when transaction occurred

columns.name: is_weekend
columns.description: Binary flag indicating if transaction occurred on weekend. 0 for weekday, 1 for weekend (Saturday/Sunday)

important_notes: merchant_category is always NULL for P2P transactions
receiver_age_group is NULL for non-P2P transactions (P2M, Bill Payment, Recharge)
fraud_flag = 1 means flagged for review, NOT confirmed fraud
query_guidelines: When calculating failure rates, use COUNT(*) WHERE transaction_status='FAILED' / COUNT(*) * 100
For merchant analysis, always filter WHERE merchant_category IS NOT NULL
For P2P analysis, use WHERE transaction_type='P2P'
For age group comparisons in P2P, use both sender_age_group and receiver_age_group
For fraud analysis, use fraud_flag=1 but clarify these are flagged for review, not confirmed fraud
Weekend analysis should use is_weekend=1 or day_of_week IN ('Saturday', 'Sunday')
Peak hours are typically defined as hour_of_day BETWEEN 18 AND 21
